SEARCH
Package enquiry

Class EnquiryManager

java.lang.Object
enquiry.EnquiryManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnquiryManager
public class EnquiryManager extends Object implements IEnquiryManager
Manages user enquiries for BTO projects, including persistence and retrieval.

Supports loading from CSV, exporting to CSV, adding new enquiries, querying by sender or project, editing messages, and replying.

  • Method Details

    • loadFromCSV

      public void loadFromCSV(String filename, IUserManager userManager, IProjectManager projectManager)
      Loads enquiries from a CSV file, creating Enquiry instances.

      If the file does not exist, creates a new one with a header.

      Specified by:
      loadFromCSV in interface IEnquiryManager
      Parameters:
      filename - path to the CSV file
      userManager - for resolving sender User objects
      projectManager - for resolving Project objects

    • parseCSVLine

      private String[] parseCSVLine(String line)
      Parses a single CSV line into its component fields, handling quoted tokens.
      Parameters:
      line - the raw CSV line
      Returns:
      array of field values

    • exportToCSV

      Parameters:
      filename - path to output CSV file

    • escapeCSV

      private String escapeCSV(String field)

      Parameters:
      field - the raw field value
      Returns:
      safely escaped CSV field
